name: Grand Marnier Cordon Rouge
comments: There is no official nutrition facts table, but various unofficial sources agree on a sugar content of between ~20-22%. (https://shop.frankfurt-airport.com/en-US/product/grand-marnier-cordon-rouge-liqueur-40-1l_ce87c22e7fdf2934, https://www.myfooddiary.com/foods/4707492/grand-marnier-cognac-and-orange-liqueur, https://www.recipal.com/ingredients/49490-nutrition-facts-calories-protein-carbs-fat-grand-marnier)

name: Baileys Irish Cream
comments: From nutrition facts table: 18g/100ml sugars => 18% sugar, 13.6g/100ml fat => 13.6% fat (https://www.baileys.com/en/products/baileys-original-irish-cream)

name: Marsala Wine
comments: It depends on the specific product, but Marsala wines typically have between 15-20% ABV, and a sugar content of 10-17%. Here we use 17% ABV and 13% sugar as representative values.
